participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, Emily enjoys connecting with others and sharing experiences. She's optimistic and loves to learn new things.
participant_1.background: I'm pregnant with my first child. I live with my husband in Pennsylvania. I read a book every week. I started a new job as a PA three months ago.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, George enjoys exploring nature and trying new foods. He has an entrepreneurial spirit and is passionate about his work as a bee farmer.
participant_2.background: My favorite food is papaya. My name is George. I am a bee farmer. I married a supermodel from Italy. I've zero family that I'm close to.
